comment.text: This translation key is used to display a quota limit message for users, indicating how many users can be added before exceeding a certain threshold. It appears in a warning dialog, specifically when setting default or tenant custom quotas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "İstifadəçilər üçün {{usersQuotaLimit}}" is a literal translation that doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'for users'. A more natural phrasing would be '{{usersQuotaLimit}} istifadəçi'
The translation 'Käyttäjien {{usersQuotaLimit}}' is incomplete and doesn't convey the full meaning of '{{usersQuotaLimit}} for users'. It's missing the 'limit' part of the phrase.

The translation "ユーザーごとに{{usersQuotaLimit}}" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "{{usersQuotaLimit}} for users". It translates to "{{usersQuotaLimit}} per user". The original phrase implies a limit *for* users, not *per* user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ユーザーの制限は{{usersQuotaLimit}}です

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation "사용자에 대한 {{usersQuotaLimit}}" is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Korean. It implies the quota limit *belongs to* or is *about* the users, rather than being a limit *per* user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like "사용자당 {{usersQuotaLimit}}" ({{usersQuotaLimit}} per user) or "사용자 {{usersQuotaLimit}}까지" (up to {{usersQuotaLimit}} users).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ກຳນົດຈຳນວນຜູ້ໃຊ້ສູງສຸດ {{usersQuotaLimit}} ສຳລັບຜູ້ໃຊ້" is too literal and slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be something like "ຈຳນວນຜູ້ໃຊ້ສູງສຸດແມ່ນ {{usersQuotaLimit}} ສຳລັບຜູ້ໃຊ້" or "ຜູ້ໃຊ້ມີຈຳນວນສູງສຸດ {{usersQuotaLimit}} ສະບັບ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising to "ຈຳນວນຜູ້ໃຊ້ສູງສຸດແມ່ນ {{usersQuotaLimit}} ສຳລັບຜູ້ໃຊ້" or "ຜູ້ໃຊ້ມີຈຳນວນສູງສຸດ {{usersQuotaLimit}} ສະບັບ".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'utilizadors' is a misspelling of 'utilizadores'.

The translation "පරිශීලකයින් සඳහා {{usersQuotaLimit}}" is a literal translation but doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'limit for users'. A more natural translation would express the concept of a quota.
The variable {{usersQuotaLimit}} is retained in the Sinhala translation, which might not be ideal for user-facing text. Consider localizing the value itself instead of using the variable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: If possible, replace {{usersQuotaLimit}} with the actual number or a localized representation of the limit.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation 'Kullanıcılar için {{usersQuotaLimit}}' literally translates to 'For users {{usersQuotaLimit}}'. A more natural and accurate translation would indicate the limit *of* users. 'Kullanıcılar başına {{usersQuotaLimit}}' would be a better option, meaning '{{usersQuotaLimit}} per user'.

The translation '用户的{{usersQuotaLimit}}限制' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of '{{usersQuotaLimit}} for users'. It translates to 'limit for users' which isn't the intended meaning. The original English implies a quota or limit *applied to* each user.
